column4: hey i need someones help.... im trying to edit the kismet.conf file to put in my wireless card but when i oppen it change the parts i need to an go to save it i get a permission error.... how do i fix this?
so, should you have permission for editing (writing) the file? Do you?
the editing of the _file_ usually happens only when your editor saves the changes to the file.
so, check that you have write permissions to the file.
